overview: Your favorite shock jock gets ten times naughtier in this laugh riot parody that pushes the limits of the King of all Media himself! Packed with low-brow banter and sick humor, you'll get a ring side seat to the 'private parts' you could previously only imagine! We all know Howard loves strippers and porn stars, but this version will let you live out the ultimate happy ending with every super-hot guest, not to mention a hilarious fantasy sequence where Howard and Robin imagine what it would be like if they got it on! This serious sensation send-up is guaranteed to leave your side-splittingly satisfied!
title: Official Howard Stern Show Parody
